lead_paragraph: African-Americans and Latinos continue to own and use advanced features of cellphones more than whites do, with 87 percent of each group owning a cellphone compared with 80 percent for whites.
snippet: African-Americans and Latinos continue to own and use advanced features of cellphones more than whites do, with 87 percent of each group owning a cellphone compared with 80 percent for whites.

headline.main: Minorities Favor Phones in Using Web
headline.print_headline: Minorities Favor Phones in Using Web
